meanings.definition: The quality of being tricky or difficult to understand or deal with.
meanings.sent1: The trickiness of the puzzle left me scratching my head.
meanings.sent2: I struggled with the trickiness of the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The trickiness of the situation made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the trickiness of life's challenges requires patience.
meanings.sent5: The trickiness of the maze made it exciting to solve.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being deceitful or dishonest.
meanings.sent1: She was caught in the trickiness of her lies.
meanings.sent2: The trickiness of his behavior was finally exposed.
meanings.sent3: His trickiness in avoiding chores was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The trickiness of the fox in the fable taught an important lesson.
meanings.sent5: The trickiness of the magician's tricks amazed the audience.
